mapper.insert:
select sharing_reservation_seq.nextval from dual
insert into sharing_reservation(reservation_no, sharing_type, car_no, member_id, rental_price, rental_date, rental_ucar_zone_name, return_date, return_ucar_zone_name, reservation_date) values(#{reservationNo}, #{sharingType}, #{carVO.carNo}, #{memberVO.memberId}, #{rentalPrice}, to_date(#{rentalDate},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI'), #{rentalUcarZoneName}, to_date(#{returnDate},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI'), #{returnUcarZoneName}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select s.reservation_no, s.rental_price, m.driving_fee, c.car_no, s.member_id, c.car_nick_name, c.ucar_zone_name, u.ucar_zone_address, c.car_model, to_char(s.return_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD DY HH24:MI') as return_date, to_char(s.rental_date,'YYYY/MM/DD DY HH24:MI') as rental_date, ceil((s.return_date-s.rental_date)*24*60) as available_time, s.sharing_type from sharing_reservation s, car c, ucar_zone u, car_model_info m where s.car_no=c.car_no and c.ucar_zone_name=u.ucar_zone_name and c.car_model=m.car_model and reservation_no=#{value}

select to_char(rental_date,'YYYY/MM/DD DY HH24:MI') as rental_date, to_char(return_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD DY HH24:MI') as return_date from ( select r.car_no, r.rental_date, r.return_date from sharing_reservation r, sharing_status s where r.member_id=#{memberVO.memberId} and (s.status='예약' or s.status='이용요금결제' or s.status='이용중' or s.status='연장') and r.reservation_no=s.reservation_no ) where to_date(#{rentalDate},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI')<(return_date+numtodsinterval(10,'minute')) and to_date(#{returnDate},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI')>(rental_date-numtodsinterval(10,'minute'))
mapper.update: update sharing_status set status=#{sharingStatus} where reservation_no=#{reservationNo}
mapper.insert: insert into sharing_return(reservation_no, driving_price, mileage, return_ucar_zone_name, real_return_date) values(#{reservationNo}, #{returnVO.mileage}*(select driving_fee from sharing_reservation r, car c, car_model_info m where c.car_no=r.car_no and m.car_model=c.car_model and r.reservation_no=#{reservationNo}), #{returnVO.mileage}, (select return_ucar_zone_name from sharing_reservation where reservation_no=#{reservationNo}), sysdate)
mapper.select: select r.reservation_no, r.driving_price, r.mileage, m.driving_fee, c.car_no, s.member_id, c.car_nick_name, r.return_ucar_zone_name, u.ucar_zone_address, c.car_model, to_char(s.return_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD DY HH24:MI') as return_date, to_char(s.rental_date,'YYYY/MM/DD DY HH24:MI') as rental_date, ceil((s.return_date-s.rental_date)*24*60) as available_time, to_char(r.real_return_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD DY HH24:MI') as real_return_date, s.sharing_type from sharing_reservation s, car c, ucar_zone u, car_model_info m, sharing_return r where s.car_no=c.car_no and c.ucar_zone_name=u.ucar_zone_name and r.reservation_no=s.reservation_no and c.car_model=m.car_model and r.reservation_no=#{value}
